amendment.description: To maintain parity for wind and solar facilities under the Internal Revenue Code of 1986.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2717 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 53. Record Vote Number: 364.

action.text: Amendment SA 2717 proposed by Senator Rosen to Amendment SA 2360.
